about.firstParagraph: All Knotel spaces are tailored to the needs of each individual company by an in-house team of architects, interior designers, and workplace strategists. Our subscription model includes all branding, furniture, and IT needs in a single annual agreement.
about.secondParagraph: Below are some resources to further explore about Knotel.
